DOC.brief_summary: This trial is performed to assess the efficacy and safety of the ALK Grass tablet for treatment of grass pollen induced rhinoconjunctivitis (hayfever).
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of the ALK Grass Tablet in Subjects With Hayfever
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria: A history of grass pollen induced rhinoconjunctivitis Positive skin prick test to grass Positive specific IgE to grass
